title: Love Lottery
description: Love Lottery'I really really am through with boys,' I said. 'Relationships stink.' 'Why so cynical Becca?' asked Cat. 'You're usually the most romantic of all of us.''Yeah. We're not having you giving up are we guys?' said Squidge.'Truth Dare Kiss Promise. Only you don't get to choose.It's kiss. You must kiss the next boy who comes onto the beach.'Becca thinks she's through with boys - that is until Squidge dares her to kiss the next one who walks onto the beach. The boy she picks has just arrived on holiday from London and is overwhelmed but happy at this welcome. As Becca stands back and sees him properly, she realises that she really quite fancies him.The rest of her life however is not without its complications. Her parents' marriage is on the rocks and Becca becomes increasingly stressed about what is going to happen to her and her familiar family unit. She questions everything to do with relationships and with the support of her friends, she takes steps to discover what and who she truly values in her life.
author: Cathy Hopkins
